message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a great price of $150.  I think you'll find it's a great deal!
Hi Alice, $150 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $85 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  I could come down to $130, but I can't go any lower than that.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $130 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $100. If you can't come down to that, I'll have to take my business elsewhere.
